title: Away Moderation
announcement: Away is an open source state of the art Discord Moderation bot developed for Discord Hack Week.

help.description: Relay information about the Away Moderation Bot.

prefix.description: Change the phrase used as the prefix. Default is ^.
prefix.error: Please specify a single phrase to set a new prefix.
prefix.success: You have updated Away's prefix succesfully.

evalstatus.description: Manage the string evaluation feature status (keyword moderation).
evalstatus.error: Please specify the desired status or strength for string evaluation.
evalstatus.success: You have updated Away's string evaluation status succesfully.

evalpunish.description: Manage the punishments given after a certain amount of evaluations exceeding the status limit.
evalpunish.error: Please specify a punishment type and limit for string evaluation.
evalpunish.success: You have updated Away's string evaluation punishments succesfully.

dump.description: Dump all data tied to Away in your server.
dump.success: We have succesfully retrieved your data.

reset.description: Wipe and reset your server data for Away.
reset.success: You have wiped and reset Away's data for your server.
